articles.author: AJ Cassavell
articles.title: Yu Darvish's stellar start spoiled in loss to Nationals - MLB.com
articles.description:
SAN DIEGO -- Should the Padres have lifted Yu Darvish earlier? Heck, should they have let him pitch longer?
Really, those questions belie the point. Darvish was outstanding on Thursday night against Washington, cruising through eight innings and pitching into…
